item.title: 'He likes family': Trump defends running mate's cat lady slur
item.description: Republican nominee says JD Vance has "tremendous support" as he faces questions over his suitability as a running mate.

item.title: Giant Zoom calls fuel record fundraising behind Harris campaign
item.description: Big donors helped push Biden out. Now ordinary people have the spotlight as they fundraise for Harris via video calls.

item.title: Trump defends JD Vance’s ‘childless cat ladies’ comment in Fox News interview
item.description:
The Republican nominee also confirmed he would be interviewed by the FBI about the assassination attempt against him

Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has defended Senator JD Vance’s past comments about “childless cat ladies”, saying that Vance was simply trying to show how much he values family life.

Vance’s 2021 comments criticising vice-president Kamala Harris and other Democrats as “a bunch of childless cat ladies who are miserable at their own lives” resurfaced after Trump selected the Ohio senator as his running mate earlier this month.

Continue reading...

item.title: Trump Explains Why He Told Crowd They Won’t Have To Vote, And Makes It Sound Worse
